Name That Part!

The game for discerning bicycle mechanics and nerds alike.

Choose Game Difficulty

How to play

Rookie Difficulty

  • Click 1 of the 4 options for the bike part you see
  • If you take longer than 20 seconds for any part, game over
  • You'll get your score when you finish the game
  • There is no scoreboard for Rookie difficulty

Veteran Difficulty

  • Click 1 of the 4 options for the bike part you see
  • If you take longer than 20 seconds for any part, game over
  • If you choose the wrong answer for any part, game over
  • If you're in the top 100 scores, you'll join the scoreboard
